trends: There has been one other sighting in Bluff City
There were no other sightings in Bluff City on or around April 27th 2012
Summary: Four white , hazy (cloudy outside) lights doing a geometrical dance in the sky......
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter came over after work and said, you got to see this.... I stepped out onto my porch and to my left as if almost in between looking in the direction of Johnson City, TN and Elizabethon, TN. There was 4 white, hazy lights (approx size--size of each light a grapefruit). The 4 lights as if starting from a center point (disappear for an instant) then geometrically expand out in 4 separate directions without leaving a trail of light or beam of light as if a square of 4 lights in each corner on full expansion (approx full expansion a beach ball) then all 4 lights would go back into center point and disappear for an instant and then repeat the same pattern. Now I know what a lighthouse light will do and usually there is a start point from the ground with a beam of light projecting and circling. I did not see a source of light as if coming from the ground. The lights described above was well above the tree line and horizon.
